title: Bel was responsive and helpful as usual
ShipHero provides Amazon-like fulfillment efficiency with awesome customer support and simplicity for brands
reviews: ShipHero is a perfect option for new eCommerce brands. We evaluated a large number of fulfillment providers for our sustainable dog food brand, and ShipHero's model (no fixed fees or contract, simple storage fees, flat shipping fee across zones) is vastly superior for new brands with growing customer bases. ShipHero's support team is extremely responsive and works to find a solution, including enabling things like custom branded boxes. We've appreciated additional services like coordinating freight from our manufacturing facility. ShipHero combines the fast, efficient fulfillment service you'd expect from a giant like Amazon with flexible, responsive customer support.

title: Rushed onboarding, brusk customer support, confusion around pricing, but platform works
reviews:
I reviewed the myriad choices for 3rd party fulfillment direct to customer. After extensive analysis of price and reviews, I landed on ShipHero. I was attracted to the idea of zone-less postage pricing, and found the company voice to be clear and concise. I reached out and started a conversation with their sales team.

The sales agent was clear but curt. I did appreciate that they did not attempt to follow up with me when I delayed for a significant period. When I did eventually confirm that I was moving forward, we scheduled a call for sales onboarding. This call was entirely too rushed, I could barely follow what the agent was talking about as we walked through the product user interface, which isn't a great feeling after you've finally pulled the trigger after careful and thorough research.

Following this, I was handed off to a customer support representative dedicated to onboarding. This person was definitely less curt, but she failed to correctly enter the type of packaging that I wanted to use for my product. And the web app has limited ability to enter certain information about your product, including what kind of package you want to use. That's something I'd love to have control over, I definitely don't want to be reaching out to customer support when something like that changes. As a result, a heavier package was used, and the shipping cost increased. Once you finish your onboarding with ShipHero, you can only contact customer support through the chat widget within the app. So I began communicating with the to fix the problem.

My experience with in-app customer support has been so-so. They say 20 minute average response time, but I've experiencing nothing shorter than 24 hour responses (it may not help that I'm in a timezone outside of the US). My interactions with these support agents have also been quite curt, though they did eventually solve the problem. However, the pricing on the ShipHero website is not clear when your unit weight is around 1lb. Apparently anything from 15oz to 16oz is rounded up to a pound, which I could not find clear language around on the pricing page. So now I'm paying more than I initially calculated for shipping, which was part of the reason why I chose ShipHero.

All that aside, my experience with sending inventory is so far smooth. And the product is going out to customers as expected. In reality, this is the most important part of their business, so I do appreciate that things are working correctly. But my interactions with customer support have definitely left much to be desired. I hope that as time moves forward, my impression will continue to improve. It's just a bit of a shame that my first impression is a bit murky.

title: Could be better
reviews:
I have been sending shipments with this company for a few days, and so far, I have been pleased. The communication is fantastic, and they fulfill incredibly fast.

Carina is simply great. This level of support is what all good companies should aim for. It's almost like having a personal advisor. Thank you, Carina!!!!! <3

***UPDATE***

Unfortunately, I have to knock down three stars after a few months since I found several issues with the fulfillment process.

First, if you work with Shopify and you intend to sell part of your catalog using Ship hero, bear in mind that the app will display ALL store products and orders. For example, if you have 500 SKUS and use Shiphero to sell 60, the panel will display all store orders (mixed inventories), making it extremely difficult to track orders. The filters won't work as intended in my case. The engineers suggested deleting all non Shiphero products manually within the app, which is pointless since they sync daily repeatedly, and it is very time-consuming to delete products daily.

Secondly, the packaging rules were set wrongly. Instead of using our custom packages, we had dozens of orders shipped using Shiphero packaging, which increased the shipping cost substantially, losing profit from these orders. No compensation was offered but an apology. Thank God we checked the invoices and found out.

Finally, the eventual mistakes will happen (not shipping an order in time due to operator error), which is okay, but you will need to eat up the cost or customers' negative feedback. There is no responsibility on Shiphero's end at all.

I have to say that the support is still fast and reliable. I just wished I knew all of this in advance before sending our products here.

Customer service is also very responsive, but you will need to get used to using chat support as your main method. If you ask, they will get it done.

title: Thank God for ShipHero!
reviews:
Thank God for ShipHero! As a small business owner of a curated online shop I needed a fulfillment center that was affordable, transparent and could scale. ShipHero’s onboarding team was stellar! They walked me through each step, and answered every question.

My fulfillment rep Bela is a ninja. She’s professional, communicative, transparent, honest and resolves every issue at lightening speed with tact and diplomacy. I cannot say enough about how big a part ShipHero has played in the success of my business.

As a new business owner taking the leap into fulfillment was scary. And figuring out the bottom line costs was soooo easy with ShipHero. Other fulfillment center costs were hidden. It was like playing the shell game or trying to solve some ancient riddle to figure out the costs. ShipHero made it so super clear and the costs were upfront and nothing was hidden. So, so, so simple. Yes, small businesses can afford fulfillment!! ShipHero is my hero!! Thank you Bela for your unwavering dedication. Partners for life!

title: Bad start but overall they are good
reviews:
Absolutely horrible start to their service. Without my permission and while everything was marked as ON HOLD in their system they shipped some orders, which caused a lot of issues with another warehouse/Shopify sending out cancelled tracking numbers. Later the customer service basically ignored me for 2 days. The situation still hasn't been solved 3 days later.

edit; ShipHero makes it very easy to fulfill orders. Sometimes there are issues and the customer support was a bit of a hit or miss at the beginning but now everything is going much much smoother. The chihuahua with a wig is extremely helpful too and gets stuff solved quickly and efficiently.

title: I had the worst possible experience…
reviews: I had the worst possible experience with Shiphero. After my inventory worth $250,000 arrived in their warehouse, they claimed to find a bug in one of our products (from the 1000+ we had sent). This amount had my whole life savings and also credit from our reputable supplier. They threw all my inventory outside their warehouse and refused to accept delivery. My business launch was delayed by 2 months and I had to find another 3PL at the last minute. I also got all the products inspected and we did not find a single bug in any product. I still don't know why they did this. I requested, multiple times, just to investigate what happend. Most likely, a warehouse worker probably brought in some food to the warehouse and left it near our product to attract a bug there. The worst part was that they just treated it like it wasn't there problem anymore. Not great people to do business with.

title: Great support team for all my…
reviews: Great support team for all my questions! Easy set-up and onboarding process. Thank you!

title: Very good onboarding from Andrea
reviews: Very good onboarding from Andrea. Clear and simple and got back to me very quickly with questions.

title: EXCELLENT! Best business decision i've made- Thank you Ship Hero
reviews:
The infrastructure built and customer support for ShipHero is unlike anything i've ever experienced with a company before. Clara is an absolute sweetheart and lifesaver! Being someone with lacking technical skills, she explained things easily and clearly to me, and helped me every step of the way with all my questions. Everyone at this company cares about you and your success for running an efficient business.

Andrea who helped with the on-boarding process was so informative and excellent at addressing all my questions as well.

I am IN LOVE with this company, and after comparing many other 3PL companies - ShipHero is the absolute best. Free storage for 60 days, very competitive and transparent pricing , fast and easy fulfillment, top notch customer service chat when you need help. I am beyond thrilled that I came across ShipHero. It leaves all other 3PL's in the dust!
No wonder they are expanding so quickly.

Highly Recommend!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Unanswered questions/ignored
reviews:
I usually have a great experience with the customer service here, but today was an exception. After waiting a few hours for someone to connect with me, I wrote out some questions and explained why i was confused. I was given one sentence answers that did not even come close to answering my question. I then tried to explain further and was left on read. Not only was my question left unanswered, but the representative stopped responding to me.
****Update: The team responded to me quickly after I submitted this review. They answered my question(s) quickly and have done a phenomenal job assisting me ever since! I would recommend them considering it was really only one mistake and they went above an beyond to rectify the situation.

title: Customer Support is great
reviews: Customer Support is great! I'm relatively new to 3PL and maybe that's where the frustration stems from, but it's added a lot of time to my deliveries. I used to ship directly with USPS priority mail, and never had an issue. Now with COVID packages may take 2-3 business days to fulfill and up to 5 business days for Zone 8 packages thereafter. I would use the domestic expedited service, but with the markups being so high, it doesn't make sense financially.

title: Shiphero is great and best customer support!
reviews: We are using Shiphero as a brand but with an external logistic company, so a bit funny setup (not a 3PL but our own) however it works! The Shiphero team is awesome, casual and funny. We had a lot of fun during the onboarding and was still met with a high professionalism and expertise. We were challenged on our suggestions for setup which most of the times resulted in better solutions. We experience that Shiphero is a very talented team with a solid piece of software. I would recommend shiphero to anyone on my way that needs a multi-channel inventory management system and pick&ship system.

title: Awesome company
reviews: Awesome company! Very helpful and transparent. The dashboard is great to work with and i love the integration with shopify

title: The Best!
reviews: They are responsive, helpful and work to make the fulfillment experience as seamless as possible.

title: Highly recommend Ship Hero!
reviews: I'd like to put my good words for ShipHero, specially Bel for her amazing customer support. They are indeed very good, very competent, very trustworthy. I made a good choice going with Ship Hero! If you work at ShipHero, please give Bel a promotion, she's amazing, and I am not her relative, just pleased she took care of my cargo.

title: Shiphero is the BEST!
reviews:
Shiphero is the BEST!

Thanks to Shiphero my warehouse operations are completely streamlined and efficient!

title: Great aspects still highly recommend but don't count on any support
reviews: Co-founder is great, and reason enough to stay with the company as he is extremely helpful and friendly. He has been very helpful from beginning to end and this is a nice shipping software/system. However, I do need to state, the support so far has been TERRIBLE. There are a couple support reps that are very helpful, but the majority of the time you won't reach them. Most of the time we receive either partial answers or no answers at all for days on end, even when stated issue is urgent. Basically need to assume you probably won't get much support if you need help and will have to figure it out on your own. Even with that frustration, I do still highly recommend them since the software and app are very well made and improving daily.

title: ShipHero Rocks
reviews:
#TeamShipHeroForLife

Thank you for everything you have done for our print-on-demand, flexible fulfillment 3PL, ShipDaddy.

ShipHero always goes above and beyond to help our team at ShipDaddy

That really says it all. Love these guys.

Shoutout to Nick, Maggie, and Danielle (points of contact inside ShipHero) and their wonderful team. A truly delightful operation to be in business with.

title: Great system and team to work with.
Shiphero has been the absolute BEST!!!
reviews:
Shiphero has been the absolute BEST!!!!
We have doubled in size for the past 3 years in a row and they play a major part in our growth! Very easy to work with and the entire team from top to bottom is a pleasure to work with.

title: My experience over The last two+ years…
reviews: My experience over The last two+ years is that ShipHero is a forward thinking company that puts an honest effort into customer solutioning. Maintains Available consults and understands the importance of open communications with all its clientele.

title: ShipHero gives you superhero powers 🦸‍♂️
reviews: Great system - easy to use but takes a little time to master. When you master shiphero and all the functionality, you are set for a powerhouse of a warehouse 💪

title: Great app!!!
reviews: Great app, great team!! Best value software in the market for high volume shippers.

title: Excellent platform
reviews: Extremely easy to set up. The on-site training was fantastic and very helpful. Couldn’t have asked for a better start to our new warehouse management software.

title: Best in quality and value.
reviews: We have been using shiphero as a software in our DTC brand and it is absolutely wonderful. The software is loaded with automation that helps our business become more efficient, thus helping us serve our customers in a timely manner. Price and quality are packed into this powerful software.

title: We've done a good job so far
reviews: We've done a good job so far. Great customer service. Silvana provided made for a very easy and efficient onboarding experience.

title: Excellent personnel and always…
reviews: Excellent personnel and always available when needed. Thanks Shiphero Team!!

title: Top notch support from the Shiphero team
reviews: Always have great support from the Shiphero team. Typically get responses in <10 minutes and always a friendly person on the other side willing to help!

title: Excellent onboarding experience that…
reviews: Excellent onboarding experience that far exceeded my expectations. The customer service people and the help and information they provided made for a very easy and efficient onboarding experience. Could not be happier.

title: Imagine having your best friend work in shipping
reviews: That's sort of how it is with shiphero. They tell you the truth, they'll go the extra mile for you and your customers, they apologize when there's a normal mistake and they don't make a fuss when you make one. If you're comparing Shiphero Vs. other logistics fulfillment players, stop wasting your time. They're that good.

title: The team has always been helpful
reviews: The team has always been helpful. Mari helped a lot recently and she is so responsive. Thanks again.

title: Marina and her team are amazing
reviews: Marina and her team are amazing! The onboarding was made easy, the team was super helpful and they have done everything needed to ensure the setup and transition will be seemless. I have been so pleasntly surprised with the customer service and how advance and interactive the backend is. I can easily manage orders and ensure better customer service. Every request or concern was immediately answered on a live chat, phone or email. As a business owner I am highly impressed with the level of service and reccomends Shiphero to anyone looking to improve their E-commerce and CX.

title: Excellent
reviews: Excellent service!

title: Belén Giglio was a pleasure to deal…
reviews: Belén Giglio was a pleasure to deal with. Very knowledgeable and responsive. Thank you.

title: Fast shipping, intuitive software, Great Service
reviews:
Fast shipping, intuitive software, tight integration with Shopify. Great service as well. Happy to have switched from my old 3PL to ShipHero

Processing + Shipping times to my customers are also fantastic.

title: Everything was very easy and intuitive…
reviews: Everything was very easy and intuitive to set up. I appreciate that their team spent much time to simplify the processes. After only a week I've seen a huge improvement in my conversions due to their super fast shipping times. I have recommended them to other small businesspersons in my circle

title: These Guys are Awesome
reviews: Best price, best service and fast shipping. No doubt moving all of our e-com to Ship Hero was one of the best moves we ever made.

title: Bel is always very professional and helpful
reviews: Bel is always very polite, professional, knowledgeable and helpful.

title: You'll love it
reviews: The system they have and the integration with Shopify are phenomenal. What I like about them is a simplicity and a straight to the point support. If you are a busy person in need of 3PL, you are at the right place.

title: Amazing company with fantastic service
reviews: Amazing company with fantastic service. Mario and the team over there rock! It's like night and day compared to my old fulfillment center.

title: great customer service
reviews: great customer service. Carina always been helpful and fix the problem instantly.

title: Very responsive and helpful customer…
reviews: Very responsive and helpful customer service team.

title: Excellent team
reviews: Excellent team, all professionals, Carina help me with the issues in my stores in different platforms, she was very patient

title: 100% recommend
reviews: Smooth start and onboarding, so far so good fulfillment, great customer service by Danielle - super responsive :) 100% recommend ShipHero as a 3PL
